titles.title: To amend title 4, United States Code, to authorize members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans to render a military salute during the recitation of the Pledge of Allegiance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 2/10/2011--Introduced. Allows members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans to render the military salute during the recitation of the pledge of allegiance.
